alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 8:50PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...AN AREA OF LIGHT TO MODERATE SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF WASHINGTON...FLOYD... CLARK...HARRISON...AND JEFFERSON COUNTIES... HAZARDS...An area of light to moderate snow accompanied by winds of 20 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 849 PM EST, an area of heavy snow was 12 miles northwest of New Albany moving southeast at 30 MPH. THIS AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL BE NEAR... New Albany around 900 PM EST. Louisville around 910 PM EST. Jeffersonville around 915 PM EST. Shively around 920 PM EST. St. Matthews, Audubon Park, Watterson Park, Seneca Gardens, Parkway Village, Strathmoor Village, Rolling Fields, Kingsley, Strathmoor Manor, and Bellewood around 925 PM EST. Windy Hills, St. Regis Park, Beechwood Village, West Buechel, Lynnview, Norbourne Estates, Richlawn, Meadowview Estates, Poplar Hills, and Maryhill Estates around 930 PM EST. Jeffersontown, Hurstbourne Acres, Houston Acres, Cambridge, Highview, Fern Creek, and Okolona around 935 PM EST. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
